item.title: Blank Crop
item.author: Uri Gerson
item.description:
Blank Crop

taxonomy (or some other meta data): whatever

Fill in Crop here.

(tm) becomes ™

(r) becomes ®

(c) becomes ©

1\/4 becomes ¼. This also works for ½ and ¾. The fraction can have a trailing ‘th’ as well, e.g., 1/2th.

… and … becomes …

-- becomes —

- becomes –. Embedded dashes are ignored.

blockquote

First line of block quote. Continuation of first block quote line.

Second level of block quote.

code

a = x(45)
b = a + 2
c = a * b

inline code this is inline code
